name: VersaTile
description:
As if now, this game seems to be only working in Chrome.I'm uploading a functioning executable which should work for everyone. Sadly, it will be ready in a few hours.

Made for November Game Jam in 72 Hours.

Design, Art and Music: DiCocco Theme: The ground moves! 

Check the tutorial section ingame for any help. You can press 'F' to enable fullscreen mode.
